column1: Matomo hostname, optionally including a path e.g. matomo.example.com or example.com/matomo
column2: Matomo hostname, optionally including a path e.g. matomo.example.com or example.com/matomo

column1: Listed under Settings/Website in your Matomo administration panel
column2: Listed under Settings/Website in your Matomo administration panel

column1: Enable tracking of outlinks and downloads
column2: Enable tracking of outlinks and downloads

column1: Delay for link tracking in milliseconds
column2: Delay for link tracking in milliseconds

column1: Send logged in customers ID to Matomo
column2: Send logged in customers ID to Matomo

column1: Path to the Matomo tracker Javascript. Usually "matomo.js".
column2: Path to the Matomo tracker Javascript. Usually "matomo.js".

column1: Path to the Matomo tracker PHP script. Usually "matomo.php".
column2: Path to the Matomo tracker PHP script. Usually "matomo.php".

column1: Hostname for serving the Matomo tracker Javascript. May be left empty in which case the regular hostname will be used.
column2: Hostname for serving the Matomo tracker Javascript. May be left empty in which case the regular hostname will be used.
